name: Scandlines Danmark ApS
membership:
European Community Shipowners' Associations  (ECSA)
Danish Shipowners' Association
goal: Scandlines is a company providing ferry services between Denmark and Germany. The statutory object laid down in its articles of association is to engage in shipping business and other commercial activities ancillary thereto.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Projects in the field of the trans-
European transport networks (TEN-T) and Connecting Europe Facility (CEF).
